info.title: InVirtus API
info.description: InVirtus API provides endpoints for integration services

post.summary: Link an asset with a tag.
post.description:
Use to link an asset with a tag.

Previous link for tag and/or asset is automatically removed

Use to get the asset journey history.

Note: Response limited to 25000 lines

startDate.description: Export start date in ISO 8601 format

endDate.description: Export end date in ISO 8601 format

assetGroupNames.description: Name of the asset groups to include in the export, incompatible with assetNames parameter

assetNames.description: Name of the assets to include in the export, incompatible with assetGroupNames parameter

startDate.description: Journey start date in ISO 8601 format

endDate.description: Journey end date in ISO 8601 format

post.summary: Retrieve the asset location history information.
post.description:
Use to get the asset location history.

Note: Response limited to 25000 lines

startDate.description: Export start date in ISO 8601 format

endDate.description: Export end date in ISO 8601 format

assetGroupNames.description: Name of the asset groups to include in the export, incompatible with assetNames parameter

assetNames.description: Name of the assets to include in the export, incompatible with assetGroupNames parameter

useReceivingTimeIndex.description: If false, the period applies to the GPS fix date. If true, the period applies to the date of receipt

get.summary: Retrieve a list of assets for current customer.
get.description:
Use to get the list of active assets for your account.

Note: Response limited to 25000 lines

lastZone.description: Last zone name where the asset was localised

currentZone.description: Name of the current zone of the asset, can be null if asset is outside a zone

lastLatitude.description: Latitude of the last known asset location

lastLongitude.description: Longitude of the last known asset location

lastLifeSignAt.description: Last life sign date (GPS, GPS NO FIX or BATTERY type)

get.summary: Retrieve available fields to use in search filters.

post.summary: Retrieve a list of assets for current customer.
post.description:
Use to get the list of active assets for your account.

Note: Response limited to 10000 lines

get.summary: Retrieve an asset by its UUID.

delete.summary: Archive an asset for current customer.
delete.description: Use to archive an asset on your account.

patch.summary: Update an asset for current customer.
patch.description: Use to update an existing asset on your account.

post.summary: Add an asset for current customer.
post.description: Use to create a new asset on your account.

get.summary: Retrieve available fields to use in search filters.
Retrieve a list of asset groups for current customer.
get.description:
Kept for backwards compatibility. Use POST /v1/public/asset-groups/search


Use to get the list of active asset groups for your account.

Note: Response limited to 10000 lines

post.summary: Add an asset group for current customer.
post.description: Use to create a new asset group on your account.

post.summary: Retrieve a list of asset groups for current customer.
post.description:
Use to get the list of active asset groups for your account.

Note: Response limited to 10000 lines

.

delete.summary: Delete an asset group for current customer.
delete.description: Use to delete an asset group on your account.

patch.summary: Update an asset group for current customer.
patch.description: Use to update an existing asset group on your account.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of image overlays for current customer.
Retrieve available fields to use in search filters.

post.summary: Retrieve a list of tags for current customer.
post.description:
Use to get the list of active tags for your account.

Note: Response limited to 10000 lines

get.summary: Retrieve a tag by its Mac Address.
Retrieve a user by his UUID.
Retrieve a list of zones for current customer.
